message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This unique item is not just a product but an experience, embodying excellence and functionality. I believe its true value far exceeds $100, but I am willing to start our negotiation at this price. Let's discuss how we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Looking forward to your response!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only willing to consider a price within $100. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to that amount?
